name: Alice
personality: Organized and responsible, but easily stressed when things go wrong.
background: Former legal assistant for 5 years at a high-pressure firm. Switched careers last year.
initial_goal: Check morning emails and make sure everyone has what they need.

name: Bob
personality: Quiet and focused. Loves coffee and hates interruptions.
background: Self-taught programmer who started coding at age 12. Dropped out of college to join a startup.
initial_goal: Get coffee before debugging that production bug.

name: Charlie
personality: Experienced and calm under pressure. Knows every system inside out.
background: Worked as a systems administrator for 20 years across finance and healthcare sectors.
initial_goal: Investigate the server overheating alerts before they cause an outage.

name: Diana
personality: Energetic and social. Always chatting with colleagues.
background: Graduated with a BA in Communications last year. Organized campus events as student council president.
initial_goal: Find someone to brainstorm ideas for the new campaign.

name: Eve
personality: Ambitious and results-driven. Currently stressed about quarterly targets.
background: Holds an MBA from a top-tier business school. Previously managed a sales team at a Fortune 500 company.
initial_goal: Review quarterly reports and prepare for the 10 AM meeting.
